title: Trans man seeking open minded woman
text:
Hello, I am an ftm living here in Oklahoma City. I am not unattractive and I pass for male completely, but I have not had any surgeries. I have been on hormone therapy for almost 8 years now, so I have a beard, chest hair, etc. I guarantee that unless someone looks at my drivers license no one could tell I was trans. I am looking for an open minded woman to carry on my life with. I believe love to be the most important thing in life to pursue and I am faithful and true. I am a free thinker and secular humanist. I believe that everyone should be treated with respect and honesty. I am a huge philosophy buff so I enjoy deep conversations and would love to meet someone like minded. I need to be clear that I am only interested in WOMEN, no men, no couples, no other trans people. While I myself am trans, that does not necessarily equate to being attracted to a mtf trans person. I guess I contradict myself in that regard. But anyways, I am educated, in school currently, and I am a biology major. I am a veteran, and a former military police officer. I was honorably discharged. No people on drugs including pot, cigarettes are fine. No diseases please. 

I would say stature wise I could afford to lose about 10 pounds (I mean that literally, not just an estimation or trying to be sly.) and that is the truth, I am not trying to hide anything. I will answer emails accordingly and will send a picture when asked. There is a tendency to flag my ads because people think I'm lying and biologically male, so that is why there is no picture. Also, I should specify that: being a few pounds overweight be like I am is a lot different than being obese. I am not attracted to obesity. I know that that may be harsh, however I am simply trying to be as transparent as possible, so please excuse my bluntness. 
I have dark hair in a military fade, I have dark green eyes (nearly hazel), people say my eyes and smile are my best qualities. I don't consider myself extremely handsome, nor to I consider myself ugly. Don't expect Brad Pitt, but more like Jake Gyllenhall or Jared Leto. I'm also 5'8 and around 160 pounds. I carry the weight well and I have a gut but it's a small one and I'm actively working on it. 

I don't really know what to expect out of this ad, so please don't be intimidated by anything I've said. I am extremely friendly and amiable, but I also am completely honest and tell you what I think. Some people that rubs the wrong way, so if you're one of those people, you should probably keep scrolling.

If you have any questions, please feel free to ask me, I am very open to questions, comments, etc. also, please don't flag me, I'm just trying to find a love like everyone else and there's no reason to kick me out of this forum unless you're just being an ass. Don't be an ass. ;)
